nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation:
@dev register function
     register for external locking claim
nodes.name: register

params._beneficiary: the beneficiary address to claim for       if _beneficiary == 0 the claim will be for the msg.sender.

params._avatar: the avatar to mint reputation from
params._claimingEndTime: the claiming end time.       claiming is disable after this time.
params._externalLockingContract: the contract which lock the token.
params._redeemEnableTime: redeem enable time .       redeem reputation can be done after this time.
params._reputationReward: the total reputation this contract will reward       for the token locking

register(bytes32).details: register function     register for external locking claim
